entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
